languages.text: "Долой Чорда. Правосудие Императора наконец-то показало свое гнилое нутро. Утопим же его в крови самозваных святош!"

traits.locale_text: "Долой Чорда. Правосудие Императора наконец-то показло свое гнилое нутро. Утопим же его в крови самозванных святош!"

languages.text: "Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"
languages.original_text: "Долой Чорда. Правосудие Императора наконец-то показало свое гнилое нутро. Утопим же его в крови самозваных святош!"

traits.locale_text: "Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"
"Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"
"Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"
"Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"
"Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"
"Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"

languages.text: “让库尔达去死吧。帝皇所谓的正义，仅仅是揭露了它腐朽的本质。杀了那些自诩为信仰捍卫者的家伙，让他们血流成河吧！”
languages.original_text: "Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"

traits.locale_text: “让库尔达去死吧。帝皇所谓的正义，仅仅是揭露了它腐朽的本质。杀了那些自诩为信仰捍卫者的家伙，让他们血流成河吧！”

languages.text: 「チョーダを倒せ。皇帝の正義は、ついにその腐敗の核心を明らかにした。自薦の英雄の血で、己を溺れさせよう！」
languages.original_text: "Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダを倒せ。皇帝の正義は、ついにその腐敗の核心を明らかにした。自薦の英雄の血で、己を溺れさせよう！」

languages.text: «Abajo con Chorda. La justicia del Emperador ha revelado por fin la podredumbre de su núcleo. ¡Ahoguémosla en la sangre de los autoproclamados campeones de la fe!».
languages.original_text: "Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"

traits.locale_text: «Abajo con Chorda. La justicia del Emperador ha revelado por fin la podredumbre de su núcleo. ¡Ahoguémosla en la sangre de los autoproclamados campeones de la fe!».

languages.text: "Nieder mit Chorda. Die Gerechtigkeit des Imperators hat endlich die Fäulnis in ihrem Kern offenbart. Ertränken wir sie im Blut der selbsternannten Streiter des Glaubens!"
languages.original_text: "Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"

traits.locale_text: "Nieder mit Chorda. Die Gerechtigkeit des Imperators hat endlich die Fäulnis in ihrem Kern offenbart. Ertränken wir sie im Blut der selbsternannten Streiter des Glaubens!"

languages.text: « Mort à Chorda. La justice de l'Empereur a enfin montré la pourriture qui lui ronge le cœur. Noyons-la dans le sang des champions autoproclamés de la foi ! »
languages.original_text: "Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"

traits.locale_text: « Mort à Chorda. La justice de l'Empereur a enfin montré la pourriture qui lui ronge le cœur. Noyons-la dans le sang des champions autoproclamés de la foi ! »

languages.text: "Chorda'nın canı cehenneme. İmparator'un adaleti nihayet bozulmanın kökenini ayyuka çıkardı. İnancımızın müdafileri bu lekeyi kanla sökecek!"
languages.original_text: "Down with Chorda. The Emperor's justice has revealed the rot at its core at last. Let us drown it in the blood of self-appointed champions of the faith!"

traits.locale_text: "Chorda'nın canı cehenneme. İmparator'un adaleti nihayet bozulmanın kökenini ayyuka çıkardı. İnancımızın müdafileri bu lekeyi kanla sökecek!"
